## Tender Notice

A contract opportunity has been issued for the purchase of a refrigerated floor centrifuge under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI.

*   **Title:** Purchase of Refrigerated Floor Centrifuge through Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI
*   **Reference Number:** PW-22-01015106
*   **Amendment Number:** 1
*   **Solicitation Number:** 22-58096
*   **Publication Date:** November 29, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date:** December 19, 2022, at 1:00 pm EST
*   **Amendment Date:** December 14, 2022

Tender Description
The National Research Council Canada - Human Health Therapeutics requires one refrigerated floor centrifuge with UN/SPSC code 41103906 and GSIN Code N6640BC. Suppliers must hold a Supply Arrangement with Public Works and Government Services Canada for laboratory and scientific equipment, parts, and accessories, supplies, and services. The mandatory technical criteria are outlined in Annex A of the tender documentation. Suppliers who meet the mandatory technical criteria with the lowest overall price will be recommended for contract award.

*   **Contracting Entity:** National Research Council Canada
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Nova Scotia
*   **Contact Information:**

    Carol Cooper
    carol.cooper@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
    902-293-8053
    1411 Oxford Street
    Halifax, NS
    B3H 3Z1
    CA

The notice is not open for competition, as invitations to bid have already been issued to pre-qualified suppliers under the Supply Arrangement. This notice is issued on Buy and Sell Canada for 15 calendar days, from November 29 to December 19, 2022, and may be canceled or adjusted at any time without prior notice.
